name: createApplication
description: You use a `POST` request to create a new application.

answer_method.description: The HTTP method used to make the request to `answer_url`. The default value is `GET`.

answer_url.description: The URL where your webhook delivers the Nexmo Call Control Object that governs this call. As soon as your user answers a call Nexmo makes a request to `answer_url`. Required for inbound calls only.

event_method.description: The HTTP method used to send event information to `event_url`. The default value is `POST`. For `voice` type applications only.

event_url.description: Nexmo sends event information asynchronously to this URL when status changes for `voice` applications. Always required for `voice` applications.

inbound_method.description: The HTTP method used to send event information to `inbound_url`. The default value is `POST`. For `messages` type applications only.

inbound_url.description: Nexmo sends a request to this URL when an inbound message is received. Required for `messages` type applications only.

status_method.description: The HTTP method used to send event information to `status_url`. The default value is `POST`. For `messages` type applications only.

status_url.description: Nexmo sends event information asynchronously to this URL when status changes. Required for `messages` type applications only.

type.description: The Nexmo product or products that you access with this application. Currently `voice` and `messages` application types are supported.

apiKey.description: You can find your API key in your [account overview](https://dashboard.nexmo.com/account-overview)

apiSecret.description: You can find your API secret in your [account overview](https://dashboard.nexmo.com/account-overview)

$ul: **_links**: A series of links between resources in this API in the following [HAL specification](http://stateless.co/hal_specification.html).
**id**: The ID allocated to your application by Nexmo.
**keys**: The Nexmo product that you access with this application.
**public_key**: The public key used to validate the [JWT](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/JSON_Web_Token).
**private_key**: The private key you use to generate the JSON Web Token (JWT) that authenticates your requests to Messages API.
**messages**: The Nexmo product that you access with this application.
**voice**: The Nexmo product that you access with this application.
